sentences.english: The dentist gave my tooth a blast to dry the filling.
sentences.chinese: 牙醫朝我的牙吹風使補牙材料乾結。

sentences.english: See your dentist at least once a year.
sentences.chinese: 每年至少見一次你的牙醫。

sentences.english: I learned The One With the Evil Orthodontist this afternoon.
sentences.chinese: 今天下午，我學習了《風流牙醫》。

sentences.english: Today, I went to the dentist to get a hole in my tooth filled.
sentences.chinese: 今天，我去看牙醫，有一個洞，得補補。

sentences.english: That's a sound that inspires fear around the world: the dentists' drill.
sentences.chinese: 牙醫的牙鑽能引起極大的恐懼。

sentences.english: What if the dentist says my child needs braces?
sentences.chinese: 牙醫如果說孩子需要戴牙箍，怎麼辦？

sentences.english: Please remember the orthodontist will be seeing you at 3 today.
sentences.chinese: 請記得你今天三點要看矯牙醫師。

sentences.english: We call it the dentist's waiting room.
sentences.chinese: 我們可以堪稱牙醫的候診室。

sentences.english: Jane got her bad tooth pulled out at the dentist's.
sentences.chinese: 簡在牙醫診所裏讓醫生把自己的壞牙拔掉了。

sentences.english: Today, near the the dentist, I was getting my teeth cleaned.
sentences.chinese: 這日，我去牙醫那裏洗牙。

sentences.english: Today, I went to see my orthodontist.
You know I would rather visit the dentist than study algebra and arithmetic!
sentences.chinese: 你知道我寧肯去看牙醫也不願意學習代數和算術。

sentences.english: The dentist appointment completely slipped her mind.
sentences.chinese: 她完全忘記和牙醫師的約定。

sentences.english: I go out of my way to patronize a dentist who has excellent communication skills.
sentences.chinese: 我經常光顧我的牙醫，他有着高超的交流技巧。

sentences.english: The dentist has expressed her regrets under great pressure from the public.
sentences.chinese: 迫於輿論壓力，這名女牙醫已表示後悔。

sentences.english: The last time I was at the dentist, he told me that I needed to get a filling.
sentences.chinese: 我上次去看牙醫，他告訴我需要去補牙。

definition: to give or have an injection
to correct/to rectify (e.g. a physical defect such as hearing or vision)/to cure/rectification/correction/to straighten
(of a surgeon) to perform an operation/(of a patient) to have an operation/to decapitate/to behead/to single out as a point of attack
to seek medical treatment/to see a doctor
unimportant/not serious/it doesn't matter/never mind/it looks all right, but
to post (an item on a forum)
